title: It says I have no connection
body: But I clearly have an internet connection, I can't connect, not to mention yesterday I had 1k ping, I average around 43 though.

replies.body: Hmmmm sometimes your internet can be running fine, but your network just can't get a strong signal to specific servers. It sounds like this might be the case here, so let's check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick just in case. Let me know if that does the trick!
